page.title: Office Depot Earns Fall, Blames Weather
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Office Depot Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=ODP.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">ODP.N</A> on Wednesday unveiled plans to muscle in on rival Staple Inc.'s turf to boost sales and stem a fall in market share in the increasingly cutthroat office supply business.
